config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_classic: Classic mode only makes simple changes to the position and rotation of camera
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_clipToS: Prevent camera from clipping into blocks
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_dynamic: When enabled, the crosshair will follow the player's view, ensuring consistent hit result
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_renderM: Render player model in first-person perspective
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_adjustS: Length of the adjustment per step
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_scale: Control the size of the config values, 16 = 1 block
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_vanilla: Model part to bind camera to
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_adjustO: When pressing the adjustment key, adjust the offset or rotation of camera
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_binding: Camera's X offset from modelPart being bound
Camera's Y offset from modelPart being bound
Camera's Z offset from modelPart being bound
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_referX: Reference Point's X Offset, which is used to prevent camera from clipping into blocks
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_referY: Reference Point's Y Offset, which is used to prevent camera from clipping into blocks
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_referZ: Reference Point's Z Offset, which is used to prevent camera from clipping into blocks
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_pitch: Extra pitching angle, i.e. extra rotation around left axis
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_yaw: Extra yawing angle, i.e. extra rotation around up axis
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_roll: Extra rolling angle, i.e. extra rotation around forward axis
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_classic: Determine which to adjust when pressing the adjustment key
Camera's X offset from rotation center
Camera's Y offset from rotation center
Camera's Z offset from rotation center
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_centerX: Rotation center's X offset from head
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_centerY: Rotation center's Y offset from head
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_centerZ: Rotation center's Z offset from head
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_useModM: Binding Mode config is automatically used if failed to find target model part
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_modelMo: Please refer to the wiki page of this mod to see the list of supported mods and model part names
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_modMode: Name of the model part to bind camera to
config.tooltip.xtracr_realcamera_pehkui: Adapt to Pehkui's scaling of model size
